Deep samples: always the same shape.

log10(y) = K - x*log10(x)
Examples

C[n,0] [n= 53*10^6.. n+10^4]
RANK:   0      1    2    3  4  5  6  
1000 [457,   406, 121,  12, 2, 1, 0 
2000 [929,   816, 222,  28, 3, 1, 0
3000 [1398, 1223, 329,  43, 5, 1, 0
4000 [1883, 1622, 429,  59, 5, 1, 0
5000 [2349, 2030, 540,  74, 5, 1, 0
6000 [2835, 2432, 638,  87, 6, 1, 0
7000 [3318, 2838, 737,  99, 6, 1, 0
8000 [3793, 3261, 834, 104, 6, 1, 0
9000 [4284, 3665, 928, 115, 6, 1, 0
END  [4758, 4075,1037, 123, 6, 1, 0


N     R   #n...
1000  4 [456, 404,   123, 12,  4, 0, 0, 0, ]
2000  4 [929, 820,   225, 20,  5, 0, 0, 0, ]
3000  4 [1410, 1216, 332, 35,  6, 0, 0, 0, ]
4000  4 [1889, 1632, 426, 45,  7, 0, 0, 0, ]
5000  5 [2372, 2044, 516, 55, 11, 1, 0, 0, ]
6000  5 [2864, 2451, 610, 62, 11, 1, 0, 0, ]
7000  5 [3324, 2863, 725, 72, 14, 1, 0, 0, ]
8000  5 [3789, 3278, 838, 78, 15, 1, 0, 0, ]
9000  5 [4279, 3681, 930, 92, 15, 2, 0, 0, ]
10000 5 [4745, 4108, 1031,97, 16, 2, 0, 0, ]

C[X,0] [1..10^6]
R #n
0 305460
1 557344
2 113960
3 22064
4 1124
5 48
6 0

C[X,0]  [1..X]
R  #n
0  942976
1  1678338
2  315194
3  59925
4  3397
5  170
